Package dat3.kino.services

Class MovieService

java.lang.Object
dat3.kino.services.MovieService
@Service public class MovieService extends Object
Service class for managing movies.

      Retrieves movies by cinema ID.
      Parameters:
      cinema - The ID of the cinema.
      Returns:

    • readMovie

      public MovieResponse readMovie(Long id)
      Retrieves a single movie by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the movie to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The retrieved movie.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - If no movie with the specified ID is found.

    • createMovie

      Creates a new movie.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The created movie.
